item.title: Projects blog
item.description: Focus stacking rig #projects Brief: Reuse 3D printer components to learn how to make a basic mechatronic system MVP: A one axis slide for photography Requires: Control board alu frame Progress 2023-10-03 Goal for today was to set up the dev environment for the controller The controller I’m using is the Seeed Xiao ESP32C3 The dev environment is a linux VM inside UTM VM environment. This posed a challenge in connecting the ESP32C3 because I had to pipe the USB.
